title: Man, that's one ugly Cobb (Bat Off) FS
author: edjs

posts.post_title: Man, that's one ugly Cobb (Bat Off) FS
posts.post_content:
I have the ugliest Cobb Bat off Shoulder available for sale. It may be ugly, but it is a real Cobb, and you won't find one cheaper at [STRIKE]$125[/STRIKE]sold.  Price is  net   to me, I  accept PP friends and family, or for Regular PP please add 3%   to  cover fees.  Items will  ship upon  receipt of cleared payment.    Shipping is $3.50.  Thanks for looking.

PM or e-mail me with any questions.
I'll take it! About to board a flight but will pay tonight. Can you PM or post your PayPal address?
I've seen uglier!  And if it's all in one piece, I think there are a lot of us who'd have been happy to have it at that price.  Heck, even if it's not...
Would have been nice to have my first Cobb :(

[quote name="unamuzd1" post=1566133]And if it's all in one piece, I think there are a lot of us who'd have been happy to have it at that price.[/QUOTE]

I'm betting it is not in one piece..........
It is not in one piece, but there are none cheaper that are not a reprint.:D
Damn that's a great price for that card!  Won't find any cheaper than that.

[quote name="edjs" post=1566196]It is not in one piece, but there are none cheaper that are not a reprint.:D[/QUOTE]
So what you're telling me is that it's not just one Cobb, it's TWO COBBS!!???!!??!?!!!

Yeah, I'd've been a buyer as well.  It would have been worth the thump on the head from my wife. ;)

Congrats to the person who snatched these two lovelies up!
